variable.name: Eventlist_width
variable.description: Defines the maximum width of the event list. The default value is 200 pixels.

variable.name: Eventlist_height
variable.description: Defines the maximum height of the event list. The default value is 300 pixels.

variable.name: Eventlist_shrink
variable.description: Defines 1 to shrink window or 0 to fix height. The default value is 1.

variable.name: Todolist_width
variable.description: Defines the maximum width of the to do list. The default value is 200 pixels.

variable.name: Todolist_height
variable.description: Defines the maximum height of the to do list. The default value is 300 pixels.

variable.name: Todolist_shrink
variable.description: Defines 1 to shrink window or 0 to fix height. The default value is 1.
